short_summary: Bead Mill Homogenizer with Cooling System
description: Supply of a Bead Mill Homogenizer with Cooling System
duration_in_months: We expect the contract will last between 3-12 months
full_summary:
Worldwide tenders for supply of Bead Mill Homogenizer with Cooling System
==========================================================================

**Notice ID**
-------------

*RFX ID*: 18166638
*Reference Number*: WS4273503337

**Project Overview**
-------------------

The Government of Canada invites offers for a Bead Mill Homogenizer with Cooling System for the Department of Health (Health Canada). The scope of the requirement includes the supply of the equipment as well as installation and commissioning at the specified locations.

**Request for Proposal**
-----------------------

A Request for Proposal (RFP) will be issued under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) in accordance with the Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) guidelines.

**Key Dates**
-------------

* **Tender Closing Date**: December 19, 2023 at 14:00 EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: January 19, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: Three months after the contract start date

**Bidding Process**
-------------------

Bidders are required to submit their proposals electronically through the Ariba Discovery platform. Proposals must meet the mandatory requirements outlined in the RFP, which can be accessed on the PSPC website.

**Contact Information**
----------------------

For any questions or clarifications regarding this opportunity, kindly contact:

* Adriana (Gonzalez2), Contracting Officer, PSPC
* Phone: *
* Email: <adriana.gonzalez2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>

**Notice URL**
-------------

* <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18166638?extsite=MTgxNjY2MzhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==> [1]

**Attachments**
--------------

None.
